title: State of UP vs Rajesh Kumar
summary: The case concerns a murder under IPC Section 302. The accused was found guilty based on strong evidence and witness statements.

title: Sita Devi vs Ram Lal
summary: This case involves a family dispute regarding divorce and alimony under the Hindu Marriage Act, 1955.

title: ABC Builders vs XYZ Tenants
summary: Dispute over property ownership and tenancy under Transfer of Property Act, 1882.
